Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "The Italian Job" and "The Change-Up". 

"The Italian Job" is a crime-comedy movie directed by Stephen Seagal. The main character Jack Tarses (played by Sean Penn) finds himself in an unusual situation after accidentally killing his wife during an argument over money.
In order to avoid being arrested for murder, Tarses devises a plan to rob the bank where Tarses' wife's employer works as a financial manager.
After successfully robbing the bank and escaping on a motorboat, Tarses and his gang return to their home in Italy.
Upon arriving at their home, Tarses and his gang discover that their home has been destroyed by an explosion caused by the accidental discovery of gold deposits buried beneath the surface of their home's backyard.

In order to avoid being blamed for the destruction of their home, Tarses and his gang flee from their home in Italy and embark on a journey across Europe and Asia in search of new homes and opportunities for a better future.
